TopicTitle: Problems when trying to go to the launch scene?

Articles.Content:
TOday I bought the game KSP. Once I have built my "ship", I tried to launch by pressing the green button. It all went dull as in the picture and I couldn't press any of the top right buttons. I have Win7 x64. 4GB of ram.. solutions and threads I could follow? Thank you

PS- In the pic, there isn't a ship, but that is what it exactly looks like... solutions?

Welcome to the forums!

Please read the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide sticky. It will tell you what information we need to help you.

Also, we can't view files on your computer, so you'll need to upload that screenshot to a website like Imgur or your Steam Community profile.

From just the description, it sounds like you might have a permissions issue. Please try to cause this one again, and when you do, hit Alt+F2 to bring up the debug console. Screenshot that for us as well and upload it to Imgur or something like that.
